source:
TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_SEQ_00 Quest Sync
Mogek the Marvelous is in need of a master .
target:
TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_SEQ_00特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト
バール・レス広場のお利口のモグエクは、冒険者に頼みごとがあるようだ。

source:
TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_SEQ_01Having inducted a large number of new recruits into his ranks, Mogek the Marvelous is running low on the tools and supplies necessary to see that they are properly trained. He requests that you craft the aforementioned items and directs you to speak with Mogwon, who has been rushing about Asah to gather materials for you.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_SEQ_01※本クエストには「 レベルアジャスト」が、
　設定されています。

モグエクから、モーグリ族の新米職人を訓練するための「」の製作を依頼された。製作に必要な材料をもらうため、アサー天空廊の「管理係のモグオン」と話そう。

source:
TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_SEQ_02Mogwon has set aside some prime materials you can use to craft the requested items. He asks that you take the final product to Moguppo, who is overseeing the distribution of supplies.

※In the event you lose the materials or the synthesis ends in failure, you may try again by speaking with Mogwon.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_SEQ_02モグオンと話し、を受け取った。「」をもとに「」を製作し、アサー天空廊の「仕入係のモグッポ」に納品しよう。

※「」を失った場合は、管理係のモグオンに話しかけましょう。材料を入手し、再挑戦が可能になります。

source: TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_SEQ_03<tab>Moguppo believes that the Mogmenders will be more enthusiastic about their training if they were to receive their shiny new supplies directly from you. After neatly packaging them up, he passes them to you for delivery.
target: TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_SEQ_03<tab>モグッポに<var 28 ((Item)) F23D6D01 /var>を納品したところ、新米職人のモーグリ族たちに、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C3E01 /var>を配ってほしいと頼まれた。アサー天空廊の「新米職人のモーグリ族」たちに「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C3E01 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_SEQ_04<tab>As you distribute the parcels to each of the novice Mogmenders, they express their thanks before darting away, eager to begin their lessons.
target: TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_SEQ_04<tab>新米職人のモーグリ族たちに、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C3E01 /var>を渡した。バール・レス広場の「お利口のモグエク」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_SEQ_05<tab>Mogek is delighted to hear that on top of crafting the training implements, you took the time to hand them out individually. He is certain that with your help, the newest of their group are well on their way to becoming master crafters.
target: TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_SEQ_05<tab>モグエクに報告した。新米職人のモーグリたちが技術を習得すれば、修復作業もいっそう捗ることだろう。

source: TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_TODO_01<tab><var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize training supplies)) ((Deliver the training supplies to Moguppo)) /var>.
target: TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_TODO_01<tab><var 08 E3E802E803 ((製作手帳 蛮族クエスト：<var 28 ((Item)) F23D6D01 /var>を製作)) ((仕入係のモグッポに<var 28 ((Item)) F23D6D01 /var>を納品)) /var>

source: TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the training supplies to the mentee moogles.
target: TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_TODO_02<tab>新米職人のモーグリ族に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C3E01 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_MOGEK_000_000<tab>Well met, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I was just about to send for you. You see, the sudden influx of new recruits has us short on woodworking tools and supplies, leaving those who joined us more recently with no means to begin their training.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_MOGEK_000_000冒険者さんに、頼みたいことがありますくぽ。
新米職人の技術を上達させるために、
「」を製作していただきたいのですくぽ。

source: TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_MOGEK_000_001<tab>We are sorely lacking in handsaws, and you're just the artisan we need to make them, kupo.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_MOGEK_000_001修復団いち賢いモグの分析によると、
今のモグたちが鍛えるべきは、金属加工技術ですくぽ。
その訓練で使うための、金属のナゲットが欲しいのですくぽ。

source: TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_MOGEK_000_002<tab>We are sorely lacking in sawhorses, and you're just the artisan we need to build them, kupo.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_MOGEK_000_002修復団いち賢いモグの分析によると、
今のモグたちが鍛えるべきは、金属以外の加工技術ですくぽ。
その訓練で使うための、木材や革、繊維が欲しいのですくぽ。

source: TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_MOGEK_000_003<tab>We are in dire need of resin, and you're just the artisan we need to mix it, kupo.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_MOGEK_000_003修復団いち賢いモグの分析によると、
今のモグたちが鍛えるべきは、塗装技術ですくぽ。
その訓練で使うための、塗料や保護剤が欲しいのですくぽ。

source: TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_MOGEK_000_004<tab>By now, Mogwon should have secured the necessary materials with which you can do so. If you make your way to Asah, you'll be able to begin crafting straightaway!
target:
TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_MOGEK_000_004製作に必要な材料は、
「アサー天空廊」にいる「モグオン」にもらうといいですくぽ。
よろしくお願いしますくぽ。

source: TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_MOGWON_000_010<tab>Mogek mentioned you'd be along, kupo! Well, I daresay we shall not disappoint─the selection of materials we've gathered for you will even rival the wares of vendors in the inner cities!
target:
TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_MOGWON_000_010モグエクから話は聞いてるくぽ。
この「」を使うといいくぽ。

source: TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_MOGWON_000_011<tab>Ahem. Excuse me. I exaggerate, of course, but rest assured, all that you need can be found right here! Oh, and if you would, please take the finished product directly to Moguppo. He's been beside himself with excitement since learning you'd be the one creating supplies for our trainees.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_MOGWON_000_011完成した「」は、
「モグッポ」に渡してほしいくぽ。
新米職人たちの訓練のために、よろしくお願いするくぽ！

source: TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_MOGWON_000_012<tab>Run out, have we? Just one moment, kupo!
target:
TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_MOGWON_000_012材料が必要だったら、モグがお渡しするくぽ。
欲しくなったときには、ひと声かけるくぽー♪

source: TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_MOGWON_000_013<tab>You can't find Moguppo? Where could he have─ Ah! There he is! If you squint hard enough you can see his ears peeking out from behind those boulders.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_MOGWON_000_013もう完成しているみたいくぽ。
話はしてあるから、「モグッポ」に渡してくぽ～。

source: TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_BEGINNERMOOGLEA02290_000_014<tab>Are you also searching for materials to take back to Master Mogwon? Well, you're in the right place, kupo! There's plenty to be found just over there!
target: TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_BEGINNERMOOGLEA02290_000_014<tab>ふっふっふ～ん♪　一人前に～な～るくぽ～♪

source: TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_BEGINNERMOOGLEB02290_000_015<tab>Hm? Is that who I think it is? No, no, it's my imagination playing tricks again. There's absolutely no way <var 29 EB02 /var> would be here.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_BEGINNERMOOGLEB02290_000_015あなたが噂の冒険者さんくぽ？
凄い腕前だって、モグジンから聞いてるくぽ！

source: TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_BEGINNERMOOGLEC02290_000_016<tab>All this flying back and forth has really worked up my appetite. If only I had some kupo nuts to stave off this hunger for just a bit longer...
target:
TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_BEGINNERMOOGLEC02290_000_016てい！　やぁ！
一流の職人になるために、気合を入れているくぽ！

source: TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_MOGUPPO_000_017<tab>Some moogles find it dull, but I adore this job! Spending my days sifting through the contents of every parcel we receive, and convincing people to sell us things at a cheaper price─why, it's a dream come true!
target:
TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_MOGUPPO_000_017モグは、みんなが製作したモノを預かって管理してるくぽ♪
いろいろなものが届いて、おもしろいくぽよ～。

source: TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_MOGUPPO_000_020<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, you're right on time, kupo! Did you bring them with you?
target:
TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_MOGUPPO_000_020モグオンから話は聞いてるくぽ。
「」は、無事に製作できたくぽ？

source: TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_MOGUPPO_000_021<tab>Oh, they're perfect─so perfect, in fact, it makes me think our novice Mogmenders would feel much more inspired to learn if they received their training supplies from a master <var 08 E905 ((craftswoman)) ((craftsman)) /var> such as yourself! I shall wrap them up, so might you distribute them to each of our crafters-in-training?
target:
TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_MOGUPPO_000_021うんうん、バッチリくぽ！
モグの方で、訓練用の作業道具を用意しておいたから、
作ってくれたと併せた包みを、みんなに渡すくぽー♪

source: TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_MOGUPPO_000_022<tab>I'm jealous, kupo. These are of a quality that might even surpass those given to our veteran crafters!
target:
TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_MOGUPPO_000_022モグの方で、訓練用の作業道具を用意しておいたから、
作ってくれたと併せた包みを、みんなに渡すくぽー♪

source: TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_MOGWON_000_023<tab>Now that everyone has what they need, we can begin training in earnest. I'll have these greenhorns licked into shape faster than you can eat a sack of kupo nuts!
target:
TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_MOGWON_000_023新米くんたちには、鍛錬を積んでもらって、
早く一人前になってもらいたいくぽ～♪

source: TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_BEGINNERMOOGLEA02290_000_030<tab>A special delivery for <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var>? How exciting, kupo! Let's see it, then.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_BEGINNERMOOGLEA02290_000_030ふっふっふ～ん♪　一人前に～な～るくぽ～♪
……ん、モグに何か用くぽ？

source: TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_BEGINNERMOOGLEA02290_000_031<tab>Oho! These are just what I needed! Thank you, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>!
target:
TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_BEGINNERMOOGLEA02290_000_031ステキな訓練道具くぽ、ありがとうくぽ！
早く一人前になれるように努力するくぽ～♪

source: TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_BEGINNERMOOGLEB02290_000_032<tab>W-Wait! You're the esteemed <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─in the flesh! How I have longed to meet you!
target:
TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_BEGINNERMOOGLEB02290_000_032あなたが噂の冒険者さんくぽ？
凄い腕前だって、モグジンから聞いてるくぽ！
こんなところで何してるくぽ？

source: TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_BEGINNERMOOGLEB02290_000_033<tab>Th-These were crafted by <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var>!? I shall treasure them always, kupo!
target:
TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_BEGINNERMOOGLEB02290_000_033こ、これをモグにくれるくぽ？
感激くぽ、ありがとうくぽ～！
冒険者さんみたいなスゴ腕の職人になれるよう、がんばるくぽ！

source: TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_BEGINNERMOOGLEC02290_000_034<tab>What's brought you out all this way, <var 08 E905 ((ma'am)) ((sir)) /var>? I joined for the free kupo nuts, but now that I'm here, I might as well go the full malm─there isn't any point in starting something unless you're going to be the best!
target:
TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_BEGINNERMOOGLEC02290_000_034てい！　やぁ！
一流の職人になるために、気合を入れているくぽ！
あなたは何をしているくぽ？

source: TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_BEGINNERMOOGLEC02290_000_035<tab>These are simply splendid! With them, there's nothing stopping me from becoming the premier Mogmender!
target:
TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_BEGINNERMOOGLEC02290_000_035見るからに良いものが作れそうな道具一式くぽ！
こんなものをもらえるなんて恐悦至極、精進するくぽ！

source: TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_MOGEK_000_040<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, from what I hear not only did you take the time to craft the supplies I requested, but went out of your way to distribute them as well. Thanks to you, the youngest of our crew couldn't be more excited to start their training!
target:
TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_MOGEK_000_040新米職人たちに道具を配ってきてくれて、
どうもありがとうございますくぽ。

source: TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_MOGEK_000_041<tab>I just hope their zest for learning doesn't begin to wane over the coming days and weeks, kupo. We need all the paws we can get if Zenith is to be restored in a timely fashion!
target:
TEXT_BANMOG101_02290_MOGEK_000_041みんなの技術が上達すれば、修復作業も捗りますくぽ。
だから、いろんな技術を早く身に付けてもらいたいですくぽ。
